description: Table ORD_CV_INV_LOG allows users to report on orders which have intraprocedure log information filed by an external system.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for information associated with this record.

columns.name: INTERV_FROM_EXT_ID
columns.description: Stores a pointer to a note record which was filed via an interface.

columns.name: INTERV_FROM_EXT_DAT
columns.description: Stores the contact date (DAT) of the last contact on the note record.
